title: Define keyMap struct and default keybindings
description:
Add keyMap struct and defaultKeyMap() function. Include bindings:

Navigation:
- Up: k, up arrow
- Down: j, down arrow
- ScrollUp: ctrl+u (viewport)
- ScrollDown: ctrl+d (viewport)
- Top: g
- Bottom: G
- PageUp: pgup
- PageDown: pgdn

Actions:
- Quit: q, ctrl+c
- Help: ?
- Pause: p (toggle pause/resume)
- SwitchPane: tab (cycle focus between panes)

Each binding needs:
- key.Binding with WithKeys() and WithHelp()
- Implement ShortHelp() returning footer hints
- Implement FullHelp() returning grouped bindings for help modal

Match ticks keybinding patterns exactly.
closed_reason: Added keyMap struct with all required bindings (Up, Down, ScrollUp, ScrollDn, Top, Bottom, PageUp, PageDown for navigation; Quit, Help, Pause, SwitchPane for actions). Implemented ShortHelp() returning footer hints and FullHelp() returning 3 grouped columns. All bindings use key.WithKeys() and key.WithHelp() matching ticks patterns exactly.
